SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BBS_KEY, A.BBS_PARENT_KEY, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate, A.TITLE, A.WRITE_USER_KEY, A.READ_COUNT, LEVEL, CONTENTS, (SELECT COUNT(BBS_COMMNET_KEY) FROM T_BBS_COMMENT T WHERE T.BBS_KEY = A.BBS_KEY) commentCount FROM T_BBS_DATA A WHERE A.IS_NOTICE = 0 AND A.BBS_MASTER_KEY = #{bbsMasterKey}
AND A.CTG_KEY = #{teacherKey}
START WITH A.BBS_PARENT_KEY = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BBS_KEY = A.BBS_PARENT_KEY ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BBS_PARENT_KEY DESC, A.BBS_KEY DESC ) Z WHERE 1=1
AND Z.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND Z.CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND Z.WRITE_USER_KEY IN ( SELECT USER_KEY FROM T_USER WHERE 1=1 AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY

SELECT A.BBS_KEY, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate, A.TITLE, A.READ_COUNT, B.NAME as userName, B.USER_ID, A.WRITE_USER_KEY, A.CONTENTS, A.CTG_KEY as teacherKey, A.CTG_KEY_02 as ctgKey, C.FILENAME as fileName FROM T_BBS_DATA A INNER JOIN T_USER B ON A.WRITE_USER_KEY = B.USER_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN T_BBS_DATA_FILE C ON A.BBS_KEY = C.BBS_KEY WHERE A.BBS_KEY = #{bbsKey}

SELECT A.BBS_COMMNET_KEY as bbsCommentKey, B.NAME as userName, TO_CHAR(A.INDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as indate, A.COMMENT_ as commentContents FROM T_BBS_COMMENT A INNER JOIN T_USER B ON A.USER_KEY = B.USER_KEY WHERE BBS_KEY = #{bbsKey} ORDER BY A.BBS_COMMNET_KEY ASC

SELECT T.G_KEY, CONCAT( CONCAT( CONCAT(T.NAME, '+'), T.reviewCnt), 'ê°œ') as name FROM ( SELECT B.G_KEY, B.NAME, (SELECT COUNT(G_REVIEW_KEY) FROM T_GOODS_REVIEW Z WHERE Z.G_KEY = B.G_KEY) as reviewCnt FROM T_GOODS_TEACHER_LINK A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY WHERE A.TEACHER_KEY = #{teacherKey} AND B.TYPE = 1 ORDER BY B.G_KEY DESC ) T WHERE T.reviewCnt > 0

SELECT A.G_REVIEW_KEY, A.TITLE, A.POINT, B.NAME, TO_CHAR(A.indate, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as indate, A.CONTENTS FROM T_GOODS_REVIEW A INNER JOIN T_USER B ON A.USER_KEY = B.USER_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND A.G_KEY IN ( SELECT G_KEY FROM T_GOODS_TEACHER_LINK WHERE TEACHER_KEY = #{teacherKey} )
AND A.G_KEY = #{gKey}
ORDER BY A.G_REVIEW_KEY DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimitNumber} ROWS ONLY
